name: mcp-shark
description: MCP Shark - Aggregate multiple MCP servers with a unified UI

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd mcp-server && npm install && cd ../ui && npm install
scripts.lint:ui: cd ui && (eslint . --ext .js,.jsx,.ts,.tsx || echo 'eslint not available in ui')
scripts.lint:fix:ui: cd ui && (eslint . --ext .js,.jsx,.ts,.tsx --fix || echo 'eslint not available in ui')
scripts.lint:fix:all: (npm run lint:fix:server || true) && (npm run lint:fix:ui || true)
scripts.format:all: (npm run format:server || true) && (npm run format:ui || true)
scripts.fix:all: (npm run lint:fix:all || true) && (npm run format:all || true)
